short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make external links in assessment submissions open in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brightspace Linkternal parses the D2L Brightspace DOM and adds a target attribute to external links, ensuring they will open in a new tab when clicked.
